    • setWeatherMonthRange

      public void setWeatherMonthRange​(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField, boolean summer)
      configure the month ranges for Winter and Summer. When the range for one of two seasons is set, the opposite season's range automatically assumes the remaining months in the year.
      Parameters:
      textField -
      summer -
